data.lyric:
[ti:Black Panther (Clean) (《黑豹》电影插曲)]
[ar:Kendrick Lamar]
[al:Black Panther The Album Music From And Inspired By]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Black Panther - Kendrick Lamar (肯德里克·拉马尔)
[00:08.49]Written by：Kendrick Duckworth/M. Spears/K. Gomringer/T. Gomringer/Matt Schaeffer
[00:16.98]Wait king of my city king of my country king of my homeland
[00:31.76]King of the filthy king of the fallen we living again
[00:34.34]King of the shooters looters boosters and ghettos poppin'
[00:37.06]King of the past present future my ancestors watching
[00:39.62]King of the culture king of the soldiers king of the bloodshed
[00:42.39]King of the wisdom king of the ocean king of the respect
[00:45.11]King of the optimistics and dreamers that go and get it
[00:47.61]King of the winner's district and geniuses with conviction
[00:50.33]King of the fighters king of the fathers king of the belated
[00:52.93]King of the answer king of the problem king of the forsaken
[00:55.48]King of the empathy you resent me king of remorse
[00:58.14]King of my enemies may they fall defeat I rejoice
[01:00.82]King of the skyscrapers dodging haters broke religion
[01:03.40]Nine faces go against 'em I erased 'em with precision
[01:05.94]I embrace them with collision
[01:07.46]Kings did it king's vision Black Panther King Kendrick
[01:10.22]All hail the king I dropped a million tears
[01:13.11]I know several responsibilities put me here
[01:15.76]I don't pedal backwards but I live old-fashioned
[01:18.13]And the lens that I'm looking through
[01:19.41]Won't prescribe me the right glasses masses are now free
[01:22.39]Ashes I'm dumping out 'bout to spread 'cross all seas
[01:25.06]Sisters and brother in unison not because of me
[01:27.55]Because we don't glue with the opposition we glue with peace
[01:30.27]And I'm still gon' up your organization if any beef
[01:32.93]What do you stand for
[01:34.38]Are you an activist what are your city plans for
[01:37.11]Are you an accident are you just in the way
[01:39.20]Your native tongue contradicting what your body language say
[01:41.92]Are you a king or you joking are you a king or you posing
[01:44.43]Are you a king or you smoking bowl rocks to keep you open
[01:46.98]Because the king don't cry king don't die
[01:48.57]King don't lie king give heart king get by king don't fall
[01:50.35]Kingdom come when I come you know why
[01:51.75]King king king king
[01:53.31]I am T'Challa
data.trans:
[ti:Black Panther (Clean) (《黑豹》电影插曲)]
[ar:Kendrick Lamar]
[al:Black Panther The Album Music From And Inspired By]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.49]//
[00:16.98]吾城之王 吾国之王 吾乡之王
[00:31.76]肮脏之王 堕落之王 我们得到重生
[00:34.34]抢手之王 掠夺霸者 贫民突然出现 拥护王者
[00:37.06]过去 现在与未来之主啊 吾之先祖在天有灵
[00:39.62]文化主导一切 王的战士们服从杀戮之王
[00:42.39]智慧之王 大海之王 尊敬的王啊
[00:45.11]那些乐天派的王者们 追逐着自己的梦想 奋力实现它们
[00:47.61]来自四面八方的赢家与天才遵从自己的信念
[00:50.33]战斗之王 先祖之王 还有姗姗来迟的王者
[00:52.93]给予人们答案的王者 问题重重的王者 还有被摒弃的王者
[00:55.48]怜悯众生之王 你厌恶我 悔恨之王
[00:58.14]我的敌人们也是先祖一手抚养 我顿感欢欣雀跃
[01:00.82]摩天大厦的王者 必须躲避叛变者和变质的教条
[01:03.40]哪怕对方有九个人抵抗 我也准确无疑一一解决
[01:05.94]我和他们一起拥抱毁灭
[01:07.46]王就像一只黑豹 哥就是王者
[01:10.22]所有人像我肃然起敬 哥泪纵千行
[01:13.11]我知道自己身负重任
[01:15.76]但我不会后退 哥会活得古香古色
[01:18.13]我透过放大镜所看见的东西
[01:19.41]虽不会指定何为正确的打开方式 但是民众们 你们自由了
[01:22.39]太多人因为吾王丧命 就让他们的骨灰扬撒大海
[01:25.06]兄弟姐妹们团结一心并不是因为我
[01:27.55]而是因为我们不需要太多的暴力与冲突 我们只想要和平
[01:30.27]但是你要知道 谁敢挡我的道 我必然诉诸武力
[01:32.93]你到底支持哪一边
[01:34.38]你是不是激进主义分子 告诉我 对你的国家 你作何打算
[01:37.11]你挡在我的道路上 是不是只是个意外
[01:39.20]你的母语和你的肢体语言所表达的东西自相矛盾
[01:41.92]你是王者还是小丑 还是说你只是在招摇炫耀而已
[01:44.43]你是否和我一样是一个王者 或者你只是个依靠雕虫小技莽夫
[01:46.98]因为你知道的 王者从不流泪 他们生生世世活在这世界
[01:48.57]王者从不说谎 他们对人坦诚相待 努力活下去 不让自己坠落
[01:50.35]只有我的到来 王国才得以存在 你知道为什么
[01:51.75]哥就是王者
[01:53.31]哥就是特查拉
